• Portfolio

Paul May

UX Research Portfolio

Biography: Paul May is a UX researcher and design strategist who specialises in healthcare applications and medical device design projects. He is currently working with London-based design agency Monokoto.

I'm proud to present a selection of relevant work for your consideration, and would be happy to expand upon this work at any point in the future.

This portfolio has been prepared for Google Health. Please do not distribute this work outside your team without prior permission. Many thanks.

  • Project 2
    MSK Data Products & MSK Discover

  • Project 3
    Medical Device & Healthcare Design Projects

    2017 to Present

Publications

    Creating a Synthetic Clinical Trial: Comparative Effectiveness Analyses Using an Electronic Medical Record
    2019
  • Journal of Clinical Oncology
    Electronic medical record as a research tool: virtual clinical trial comparing pemetrexed and gemcitabine, both given with cisplatin, in patients with lung adenocarcinomas
    2015
